# TODO LIST
(test) documents with live code ref
	support it in the help system
		use the link syntax
	md F5
	highlighting support inside the target file
	doc -> graph generation
	special node: bi-directional transformation scripts
	code templates
lightweight graph-based editing
	opening sync - the graph is the secondary level
	inline @in: we won't use code references twice
	rework the var system to be more convenient
		just replace names like __VAR_A with unique instances, within the same node
	"file update" node
		ignore non-tagged regions in the output file, only update the tagged parts
	could use the notebook system to manage code nodes in a graph
	lightweight ops
		*add* a node to a program
			inline in-port
		convert git diff to a node
	as a way of organizing build steps and semantic code piece grouping
		meta-makefile + patch management
		patch: collection of code blocks and their placements
			persistent bookmarks
			generate from git diff / global search / manual marking
	core op: code block tag
		tag a range of code with a name
		the ranges can nest
			they can serve as both out and in ports
		nested ranges are displayed as graph edges
		there is no sync: the tags merely serve as visualization / locating aid
		tags are organized using external files
			just cite them in literate-programming-like documents
		tagged code can be easily moved around
			e.g. from an example to real production code
			dup a document, then reconnect
		organize the documents as files
			they could be just implemented as files
			and have the references rendered as views to the actual code
	--
	implementation
		(done) ctrl+b: create code block and copy block name
		md file hook:
			when a line refers to a block, show a view into it
			cache tag-file maps, map to location in the parser / loader
				update the cache in parsers

release on github, again

remove the help system?

	running a markdown: open as help page?
runtime completion

		security concerns...
code beautifier
	help code / smart paste auto beautification
diff to generate undo ops on reload
AC plugins
	tex ref
	bash
	js member name in certain strings

	providing explanation in AC sources
put plugins in ~/.qpad
make top hint / notification dodge MouseOver / cursor
swap ctrl+shift+v and ctrl+v?
binary editor reloading?
rendering
	true AA for roundrect

CJK PPM:
	work in conjunction with IME?
		could have blind prediction...
	iphone prediction isn't that useful
	--
	or LSTM

dedicated mobile/mobile-like UI / console UI

notebook cell ops undo/redo
nested directory in the file browser
`#pragma region` folding

rem build script for 'qpad.jc'

cd /d c:/tp/qpad
jc -brelease -awin64 qpad.jc
jc -brelease -awin32 qpad.jc
rem jc -brelease -amac qpad.jc
cd bin\win32_release
del qpad3beta_32.7z
7z a qpad3beta_32.7z qpad.exe
cd /d c:\tp\qpad
cd bin\win64_release
del qpad3beta_64.7z
7z a qpad3beta_64.7z qpad.exe
del c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad_old.exe
ren c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad.exe qpad_old.exe
copy qpad.exe c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad.exe
